tariff.name: Next Drive Smart
tariff.description: Fixed tariff with off peak (00:00 - 07:00) and peak (07:00 - 00:00) rates, and smart charging capability which charges the car when the electricity is the cheapest, meaning the customer is charged the off-peak rate whenever the car is charging
tariff.target_customer: Priced lower than the EV product Customer with EV - likely to be price sensitive / tech savvy. Should not be for customers with other solutions
